anathema: Dispose of waste near flowers, dispose of withered flowers improperly, harvest flowers without offering the proper prayers
edict: Offer appropriate flowers to other divinities, practice herbalism, tend to sacred flowers
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Arundhat (The Sacred Perfume)](/Deities.aspx?ID=610)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Offer appropriate flowers to other divinities, practice herbalism, tend to sacred flowers

**Anathema** Dispose of waste near flowers, dispose of withered flowers improperly, harvest flowers without offering the proper prayers

**Area of Concern**
Blossoms, diplomacy, scent

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)

**Domains** [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Plant or Fungus](/Spells.aspx?ID=1705)

- **2nd**
[One with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=1618)

- **8th**
[Burning Blossoms](/Spells.aspx?ID=878)

</column>
name: Arundhat (The Sacred Perfume)
